name: Sonic Boom
overview: Sonic Boom is a total modification of Sonic 2, created by snkenjoi and iojnekns, along with a wide array of talented contributors. As of the Seventh Annual Hacking Contest, this collective is referred to as SÆGA. Moves In the air and in a ball Flying Kick A (costs 5 rings) Double Jump B Diagonal Dash C (costs 2 rings) Downward Dive Down (costs 1 ring) In the air and not in a ball Air Roll (Go into a ball) Down On the ground and running/standing Walk/Limit Speed Hold A On the ground and rolling Stand up Up
